Briefly about me

Hello everyone! My name is Ismar and I am a student of Information Technologies and a full-stack web developer. Trough the school or by myself, I've been learning various IT technologies and programming languages, but found myself the best into the web development. Welcome to my little piece of internet!

My skills




What do I offer?

I'm offering website development for you or your company, static or dynamic, built on modern technology. My websites are fully responsive, adapting to all resolution and devices: mobiles, tablets, laptops or large screens!

Why choose me?

  • Creative
  • Original

  • Write clean code
